## How To Play:

Use spells on portraits of party members. Don't let them die. Survive 15 waves.

### Spells:
Click on spell or use keyboard (1,2,3,4,5,6)
1. Heal (3 sec cooldown) - Heals Target for 40HP.
2. Group Heal (10 sec cooldown) - Heals Target for 30HP and Rest of the team for 15HP.
3. Resurrection (30 sec cooldown) - Brings dead party member to live and restores health to max. Can be used on living.
4. Magic Shield (15 sec cooldown) - Drops shield on party member. 
5. Divine Power (50 sec cooldown) - Drops shield on party member. In addition brings your restores your cooldowns.
6. Cure Poison (2 sec cooldown) - Cures poison.

#### Effects:

1. Shield: Damage is halved; Lasts 20 seconds.
2. Poison: Character loses 2HP per 2 secs. Lasts until cured with spell or until death.

### Info:

Engine: Unity 2019.1.4f1.
Graphics made in GIMP 2.
Sound effects created with sfxr.
Music created in online midi creator and modified in Audacity. (first attempt on creating music for jam, me very trashy version of drums inspired by Blue Monday).
